attributes.comment:
Please reconsider raising the cost of adoption related documents. Adoption is
expensive enough already, and it is unconscionable to raise fees by up to 66% for
adoption-related petitions, especially with many of us having to renew our I-
600a/171H because they expired in 18 months before we are even referred a child.
As a parent waiting to adopt and knowing I will very likely be renewing my I600a
form next year prior to bringing home a daughter I ask you to not raise the prices,
which just add to the total cost of bringing a child to his/her forever family. Thank
you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Karyn Walden-Forrest
